title: Everything I need
content: This box of Tampax is perfect for my entire menstruation. I like that I only have to get one box now instead of three different boxes to get through my week. I'm able to use the appropriate size at the appropriate time of my flow. These come individually wrapped and color coded. I grab what I need for the day, throw them in my purse and I'm all set. The Tampax name is one I know I can trust for quality as they have never let me down.
